doc:
Sarah Padden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarah_Padden 0 Sarah Padden (October 16, 1881 England – December 4, 1967 Los Angeles, California) was a theatre and film character actress. She performed on stage in the early 20th century. She is noted for her expressive voice and for her psychological studies of the characters she portrayed. Her finest single-act performance was in The Clod, a stage production in which she played an uneducated woman who lived on a farm during the American Civil War. Sarah_Padden ( October_16 , 1881_England – December_4_,_1967_Los_Angeles , California ) was a_theatre_and_film_character_actress . She performed on stage in the_early_20th_century . She is_noted for her_expressive_voice and for her_psychological_studies of the_characters she portrayed . Her_finest_single-act_performance was in The_Clod , a_stage_production in which she played an_uneducated_woman who lived on a_farm during the_American_Civil_War .
